descriptive.title: Payment method Klik&Pay.
descriptive.subtitle: Privileged by clients Worldwide, Klik & Pay is a global secured gate-away payment solution accessible via CPU, tablet or smartphone. Partner of both International Banks and Acquiring Institution, Klik & Pay offers you the possibility of simply choose your method of payment as well as adapting to your business needs no matter your area of expertise.
